column1: fact
The Ministry of Health expanded the Ayushman Bharat coverage to include outpatient diagnostics in 2024.
In 2025, the Ministry of Railways launched 50 new Vande Bharat trains connecting tier-2 cities.
The Ministry of Power committed to 60% renewable energy generation by 2030 under the National Energy Mission.
Digital India 2.0 introduced mandatory digital lockers for all state welfare disbursements in 2024.
The Ministry of Agriculture doubled the PM-Kisan installment to ₹8,000 annually in 2025.
The Department of Telecommunications rolled out nationwide 6G pilot corridors in 10 smart cities in 2025.
The Ministry of Education mandated coding curriculum from class 6 under NEP 2020 reforms in 2024.
The Jal Shakti Abhiyan funded 5,000 rural desalination units for coastal villages in 2025.
The Ministry of Environment notified a complete ban on single-use plastic packaging by 2026.
Startup India 3.0 introduced zero capital gains tax for DPIIT-recognized startups until 2028.
The Ministry of Tourism created an e-visa waiver for 25 G20 partner countries in 2024.
The National Logistics Policy established 20 multimodal parks to cut freight time by 30% in 2025.
The Ministry of Housing sanctioned 2 million urban rental homes under PMAY-U in FY2024-25.
The Department of Fisheries created a ₹5,000 crore blue economy fund for deep sea farming in 2025.
Make in India 2.0 reserved 40% of defense procurement for domestic MSMEs in 2024.
The Ministry of Finance launched a green sovereign bond worth $5 billion in April 2024.
The Ministry of Road Transport converted 200 national highway toll plazas to ANPR-based tolling in 2025.
The National Skill Mission introduced a rural drone pilot certification scheme in 2024.
The Ministry of Labour expanded the e-Shram portal to provide micro-insurance for 50 million workers in 2025.
The Ministry of Food Processing set up 100 new primary processing centers in northeast India in 2024.
The Department of Biotechnology opened three mRNA vaccine research hubs across Delhi, Pune, and Hyderabad in 2025.
The Ministry of Culture digitized 10 million archival pages under the Bharat Archives Mission in 2024.
The Ministry of Petroleum mandated 20% ethanol blending in petrol nationwide by December 2025.
The National Cyber Security Coordinator deployed 24x7 cyber defense centers in every state capital in 2024.
The Ministry of Textiles launched a PLI scheme for technical textiles worth ₹12,000 crore in 2025.
The Ministry of MSME introduced collateral-free export credit up to ₹5 crore in 2024.
The Ministry of Electronics set up 15 semiconductor design incubators under the Semicon India program in 2025.
The Department of Space operationalized a commercial small satellite launchpad at Kulasekarapattinam in 2024.
The Ministry of Ports installed shore-to-ship power systems at all major ports by mid-2025.
The Ministry of Women and Child Development launched the Sampoorna Nutrition Card tracking system nationwide in 2024.
